data.text:

3 mile 14:57.1

1500: 4:06.78

3,000: 8:51.62

5,000: 15:10.90

6K (xc): 19:11.3

8K (xc): 25:22.8

10K (xc): 34:44.2

2020-21: No competition due to coronavirus pandemic.

2019-20: PRs indoors in the 3000m at HYP and in the 5000m at the BU David Hemery Valentine Invitational ... Outdoor season cancelled due to coronavirus pandemic.

2018-19: In cross country competed at the Harvard-Yale-Princeton tri-meet finishing 10th overall in 19:11.3 for 6K… Finished 6th for Yale in the Men’s 8K Gold Race at the Paul Short Invitational… Finished 75th overall at the Ivy League Heptagonal Championships running 26:38.0 in the 8K.

2017-18: In cross country competed in the Harvard-Yale-Princeton tri-meet finishing 7th overall… Ran an 8K personal best of 25:22.8 to finish 24th at the Panorama Farms Invitational… Competed at the Ivy League Heptagonal Championships finishing 6th for Yale… Ran his first cross country 10K at the NCAA Northeast Regional finishing 6th for Yale. In indoor track competed in the 3,000 meters at the Yale-Dartmouth-Columbia tri-meet finishing 6th. In outdoor track ran a personal best of 4:06.78 in the 1500 meters at the Mark Young Invitational… Ran the 3,000 meters in the Harvard-Yale Match...Ran a personal best of 15:10.90 in the 5,000 meters at the Virginia Challenge.

High School: Competed 3x''s at NXN freshman, junior, and senior year... Led team to NXN junior and senior year…New York All-State Athlete in Cross Country and Indoor Track senior year.
